personal_info.name: Dawid Maciejewski
personal_info.headline: Digitalization and Automation Specialist at Danfoss | RPA | Power BI | Python

personal_summary: Digitalization and Automation Specialist with a background in Computer Science and a passion for optimizing business processes through technology. Experienced in implementing automation using UiPath and Python, developing Power BI dashboards and Power Apps, and working with ERP systems like SAP and Ariba. Proven track record of collaborating with international stakeholders across Americas, Asia, and Europe to deliver data-driven solutions. Motivated to grow in the intersection of IT and technology solutions, and eager to contribute to global implementation projects at PwC.
linkedin_summary: I drive end-to-end digital transformation across procurement, combining strategic vision with hands-on technical expertise. Passionate about RPA, analytics, and actionable insights that reduce costs, accelerate workflows, and elevate stakeholder satisfaction.

responsibilities: Drive digital transformation within the Indirect Procurement organization globally.
Combine strategic vision with hands-on execution to lead automation and digitalization initiatives.
Reduce manual work, optimize workflows, and implement cutting-edge technologies into daily operations.
achievements: Designed and deployed global UiPath bots that automated 150+ manual tasks, cutting processing time by 40%.
Launched real-time Power BI dashboard powering executive insights into procurement KPIs.

responsibilities: Streamlined procurement processes for the newly transitioned DPS department in Poland.
Introduced Python automation to reduce manual email handling.
Developed Power BI dashboards for blocked invoice statistics.
Created SOPs to define workflows and structure.
Implemented UiPath automation for material creation.
Used Python scripting for SAP data extraction and automation of closing old POs.
achievements: Cut invoice processing backlog by 60% through combined Python and RPA solutions.
Standardized SOPs adopted by 3 regional teams, increasing process compliance.

responsibilities: Delivered service to customers and collaborated with Danish clients.
Managed quotes and parts for service requests.
Created work instructions and managed statistics using ClickView and Excel.
Supported automation initiatives and process improvements.
achievements: Piloted automation scripts in ServiceNow that trimmed ticket resolution time by 25%.
Key contributor to successful go-live of Ariba procurement module in 2023.

projects.name: Procurement Analytics Control Tower
description: Designed target data and access model; defined KPIs and refresh strategy
Prepared solution concept and estimates; facilitated workshops and sign-offs with business and IT.

The Procurement Analytics Control Tower offers a centralized, end-to-end view of procurement operations, combining real-time data monitoring with advanced analytics. It enables organizations to track supplier performance, purchasing trends, compliance, and cost-saving opportunities across all categories and regions. With predictive insights, alerts, and interactive dashboards, it helps procurement teams proactively manage risks, optimize processes, and drive strategic decision-making. This solution serves as a single source of truth, improving transparency, efficiency, and control over the entire procurement lifecycle.

projects.name: PO and FO Automation for SAP System
projects.description: Automated the processing and closure of all Purchase Orders (PO) and Forecast Orders (FO) in the SAP system. The solution streamlined the end-to-end workflow, ensuring accurate and timely closure of orders while reducing manual effort and errors. The project enhanced operational efficiency and improved data accuracy across procurement and planning processes.

projects.name: Power Apps Contact Management Tool
projects.description: Developed a centralized contact management tool using Power Apps to gather, maintain, and update contact information for Procurement Specialists across all regions. The solution streamlined communication, ensured data accuracy, and provided easy access to key contacts, improving collaboration and efficiency across the procurement network.

projects.name: Procurement Process Documentation and Standardization
projects.description: Led a cross-functional team to define, describe, and document procurement processes following a country transition. The project addressed the lack of existing documentation by creating a centralized documentation hub for all procurement workflows. Successfully reduced backlog, clarified processes, and established standardized procedures, ensuring consistency, efficiency, and knowledge continuity across the organization.

projects.name: Power Apps & Power BI Real Estate Project Management
projects.description: Implemented a solution using Power Apps for centralized data collection on real estate projects, integrated approval workflows, and interactive Power BI dashboards to monitor budget, forecasts, and project performance. The project enhanced data visibility, streamlined decision-making, and improved overall governance across all projects.

interests: Spending time with family and friends
Discovering innovative solutions that enhance life and work
